name: AutoDocCreator Automation
description: Google Docs to PDFs using Notion DatabaseAutoDocCreator lets you instantly generate PDFs from Google Docs using data from your Notion Database. All generated PDFs are automatically saved back into Notion — zero manual steps needed.Automate PDF workflows — no coding required!How It Works1. Install the AutoDocCreator extension Install the extension and setup the automation. One-time setup and configuration Quick 5-minute installation process 2. Add placeholders onto the Google Document Copy Notion
features: Install the extension and setup the automation.; One-time setup and configuration; Quick 5-minute installation process; Copy Notion Database properties placeholders; Paste them into your Google Document template; One-time setup per document template; Set your preferred automation schedule; Automatically scans Notion database; Generates PDFs using Google Document template; Saves PDFs directly to Notion database
